##

::: {#about-me}

I'm a second year student studying Statistics and Data Science at UCLA. Currently, I'm an administrative assistant at a network consulting firm. In the past, I've worked as a Learning Assistant for UCLA's introduction to R programming course. Outside of school, I'm also passionate about music as a percussionist who competes in the national indoor percussion circuit. 

## Education

University of California, Los Angeles | Los Angeles, CA

B.S. in Statistics and Data Science | Expected June 2026

:::

### Projects

I developed supplemental academic materials for UCLA's introductory R programming course (STATS20).

I created a minimalist website for [conversations with friends.](https://selina-cheng.github.io/questions-website/)

I created a Python clone of one of my favorite games, [Minesweeper.](https://github.com/selina-cheng/minesweeper)
